mapper.insert: insert into contact (own, contact, state) values (#{own}, #{contact}, 0), (#{contact}, #{own}, 4);
mapper.select: select c.id, u.id as uid, name, avatar, word, score, state, `read` from (select id, name, avatar, word from user where name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) u, (select id, own, contact, score, state, `read` from contact) c where (c.own = #{id} and c.contact = u.id); /*因为要在本人的好友里search*/
select id, own, contact, score, state, news, time, `read` from contact where (own = #{id} and contact = #{contact}); /*因为要在本人的好友里search*/
